title: 4th Helpmann Awards
text:
The 4th Helpmann Awards ceremony was presented by the Australian Entertainment Industry Association (AEIA) (currently known by its <a href="trade%20name">trade name</a>, <a href="Live%20Performance%20Australia">Live Performance Australia</a> (LPA)), for achievements in disciplines of Australia's live performance sectors. The ceremony took place on 9 August 2004 at the <a href="Sydney%20Lyric">Lyric Theatre</a>. During the ceremony, the AEIA handed out awards in 35 categories for achievements in <a href="theatre">theatre</a>, <a href="Musical%20theatre">musicals</a>, <a href="opera">opera</a>, <a href="ballet">ballet</a>, <a href="Dance%20performance">dance</a> and <a href="concert">concert</a>s.
Winners and nominees.
In the following tables, winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
